Room.Name: Milus' Magic Miracles
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing behind a big crowd watching the Illusionist's show.
Room.LongDescription: The Illusionist and his beautiful assistant are talented gnomish prestidigitators who are entertaining the visitors with various illiusions which you have never seen before. The illiusions require deep concentration and thought, so try to be quiet and not disturb the masters of magic. Maybe there is something else here which you will find more interesting?
